mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_offer (regDate, modifyDate, company, chiefName, compNum, compNumSub, business, busiItem, compAddr, managerName, position, phone, mobile, email, emailTax, taxBill, studyAddr, studyNum, equip01, equip02, equip03, equip04, memo) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{company}, #{chiefName}, #{compNum}, #{compNumSub}, #{business}, #{busiItem}, #{compAddr}, #{managerName}, #{position}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{emailTax}, #{taxBill}, #{studyAddr}, #{studyNum}, #{equip01}, #{equip02}, #{equip03}, #{equip04}, #{memo} )
